about.title: About
paragraphs: We are a family deconstructing a P2P ecosystem, without KYC, to be used by anyone, anywhere.

According to praxeology, the logic of human action always seeks to change from a less satisfactory state to a more satisfactory one. Diy Sec Lab enables a free market of P2P sellers and buyers in the simplest and friendliest way.

Unlike a conventional cryptocurrency exchange, we connect buyers and sellers in a P2P format, safely and privately. All Bitcoins traded on Diy Sec Lab are whitelisted, meaning they did not come from illicit activities and are fully legal.
You may still think: “So, to buy Bitcoin without KYC and safely, do I have to trust Diy Sec Lab's P2P?”

All Diy Sec Lab attendants are pre-selected in the SpikeProvider model, leaving a value in BTC locked on the platform as a guarantee to work with us. Thus, if any Diy Sec Lab attendant cheated, they would automatically be financially penalized in amounts far exceeding the trades.

Finally, in case of any problem, the client can contact the SpikeHelper by providing the trade ID. The problem will be carefully analyzed until resolved. We are committed to creating the best experience for you.

fees.title: Fees
fees.reflectionTitle: Reflection: Bitcoin as a Libertarian Tool
fees.reflection1: If Bitcoin is truly a libertarian tool, why do governments still allow individuals to buy BTC legally?
fees.reflection2: Basically because those who still buy bitcoin 'conventionally' need to provide all their personal details to the exchange, doing the famous KYC. This way, the government will know every satoshi you bought and where to find it.
fees.reflection3: It is true that when you buy bitcoin this way, you pay a small fee for each trade, but at the time of withdrawal, in addition to paying another fixed fee, your transaction will be exposed to Leviathan, and the tax will be inevitable, potentially reaching 22.5%.
fees.reflection4: Yes, that 'convenience' could end up costing much more in the long run. Also, you never know how they might manipulate your personal details.
fees.privacy1: It's not that hard to make the right choice. Better to ensure your privacy and anonymity.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.platformDescription1: This is a P2P platform for private bitcoin (BTC) trading, not a conventional exchange with instant transactions.
termsOfUse.platformDescription2: The operating model ensures that transactions are securely conducted between users, whether liquidity providers or order creators.
termsOfUse.platformDescription3: All providers make a BTC deposit that is locked on the platform, ensuring the effectiveness of transactions.
termsOfUse.transactionsStep1: Create an order on the site.
termsOfUse.transactionsStep2: Always remember to accept the terms of use and fees to proceed.
termsOfUse.transactionsStep3: Be attentive to the instructions provided.
termsOfUse.transactionsStep4: The transaction will begin when a provider accepts your purchase request.
termsOfUse.transactionDurationDescription1: A normal transaction can range from 30 minutes to 24 hours, depending on factors such as bank processing, proof submission, and network congestion.
termsOfUse.transactionDurationDescription2: Additional delays may occur depending on user decisions in response to market fluctuations.
termsOfUse.kycPoliciesDescription1: We do not require KYC for using the platform. Responsibility for identity verification lies with the banks that allow their customers to use an account.
termsOfUse.kycPoliciesDescription2: Our role is to ensure that trades are conducted properly, acting as a marketplace for value exchange.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription1: The operation is conducted globally, offering various payment options.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription2: Providers operate independently, with no specific ties to banks or regulatory entities.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription3: Using the platform automatically implies full acceptance of the terms of use.
termsOfUse.disputesStep1: Open a support request or contact us on WhatsApp.
termsOfUse.disputesStep2: Financial penalties will apply in cases of dishonesty.
termsOfUse.disputesStep3: Unfounded disputes will be subject to a 10% penalty of the order value.
termsOfUse.disputesStep4: Normal resolution can take from 7 to 30 days, possibly extending depending on bank analysis time.
termsOfUse.conductDescription1: Our commitment is to provide a safe and respectful environment, aligned with Bitcoin's libertarian principles.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty1: 10%: Defamation without prior attempt for resolution.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty3: 100%: Fraud attempts or trading with illicit funds.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty4: 125%: Bad faith from the provider or failure to send funds to the counterparty after receiving them.
termsOfUse.conductDescription2: Users with inappropriate behavior will be permanently banned.
termsOfUse.footer: Thank you for choosing our platform. Our commitment is to your freedom and privacy.
